      Get mode of an operation. see setMode(int, java.lang.String, int)
      static int setMode(int code, java.lang.String packageName, int mode)
      Set mode of an operation for the application specified by packageName.
      static boolean systemFixed(java.lang.String pkgName)
      If an application is fixed by system, then it's operations mode always be MODE_ALLOWED.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setMode

        public static int setMode(int code,
                          java.lang.String packageName,
                          int mode)
                   throws android.os.RemoteException
        Set mode of an operation for the application specified by packageName.
        参数:
        code -
        packageName, - package name of the application to be set
        mode, - MODE_ALLOWED or MODE_IGNORED or MODE_REMIND
        返回:
        RESULT_OK or RESULT_NO_SERVICE or RESULT_BAD_ARGUMENTS
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • getMode

        public static int getMode(int code,
                          java.lang.String packageName)
                   throws android.os.RemoteException
        Get mode of an operation. see setMode(int, java.lang.String, int)
        参数:
        code -
        packageName, - package name of the application to be set
        返回:
        MODE_ALLOWED or MODE_IGNORED or MODE_REMIND or MODE_UNKNOWN
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • systemFixed

        public static boolean systemFixed(java.lang.String pkgName)
                           throws android.os.RemoteException
        If an application is fixed by system, then it's operations mode always be MODE_ALLOWED. Request to set mode for such applications will be ignored.
        参数:
        pkgName -
        返回:
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException
